nodes.body: @adomani You might find this interesting: at least in `Geometry`, most remaining `refine`s were actually removable.
!bench

I wonder whether I should look into robustifying the linter for the replacement of `refine'` into a more general replacement tool, so that it would have caught these `refine'`s as well.

However, I'm also aware that Mario is working on one and his tool will be better.
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by adomani.
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by adomani.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/04d40412-9e93-4eb2-bd9b-862c3be22c49) for commit d475cc686425874606d1d2e80635afe49720ba39.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/6b49ec48-d444-4d47-aec7-124a635f473f/to/04d40412-9e93-4eb2-bd9b-862c3be22c49) against commit f3612d5fb5c08d1a1a2e6a4dc97800f2876c9d93.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Geometry): replace all remaining uses of refine', when possible

nodes.body: @adomani You might find this interesting: at least in `Geometry`, most remaining `refine`s were actually removable.
!bench

I wonder whether I should look into robustifying the linter for the replacement of `refine'` into a more general replacement tool, so that it would have caught these `refine'`s as well.

However, I'm also aware that Mario is working on one and his tool will be better.

Modulo benchmarking and building, this looks good to me!

maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by adomani.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/04d40412-9e93-4eb2-bd9b-862c3be22c49) for commit d475cc686425874606d1d2e80635afe49720ba39.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/6b49ec48-d444-4d47-aec7-124a635f473f/to/04d40412-9e93-4eb2-bd9b-862c3be22c49) against commit f3612d5fb5c08d1a1a2e6a4dc97800f2876c9d93.
